text: was a Japanese politician, cabinet minister, and Prime Minister of Japan from 13 December 1931 to 15 May 1932. On 15 May 1932, Inukai was shot by eleven junior Navy officers (most were just turning twenty years of age) in the Prime Minister's residence in Tokyo.Toland, The Rising Sun: The Decline and Fall of the Japanese Empire, 1936â€“1945 ==References== ==Other websites== * Inukai Memorial Museum (Okayama) Category:1885 births Category:1932 births Category:Assassinated Prime Ministers of Japan Category:Former dictators Category:Deaths by firearm Category:People from Okayama Prefecture Category:Foreign ministers of Japan
title: Inukai Tsuyoshi
